original_text: You lived in God's beautiful garden, Eden. You wore valuable jewels on your clothes. The jewels were ruby, topaz, emerald, chrysolite, onyx, jasper, sapphire, turquoise and beryl. 28: These are all names of jewels. See Exodus 28:18; 39:11; Revelation 21:20. They were fixed to pieces of gold. They were ready for you to wear on the day that you were born. You lived in God's beautiful garden, Eden.
korean_text: 네가 옛적에 하나님의 동산 에덴에 있어서 각종 보석 곧 홍보석과 황보석과 금강석과 황옥과 홍마노와 창옥과 청보석과 남보석과 홍옥과 황금으로 단장하였음이여 네가 지음을 받던 날에 너를 위하여 소고와 비파가 준비되었도다

sentences.original_text: You lived in God's beautiful garden, Eden.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님의 아름다운 동산 에덴에 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: You wore valuable jewels on your clothes.
The jewels were ruby, topaz, emerald, chrysolite, onyx, jasper, sapphire, turquoise and beryl.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 보석들은 루비, 토파즈, 에메랄드, 크리솔라이트, 오닉스, 자수정, 사파이어, 터코이즈 및 베릴이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: These are all names of jewels.
They were fixed to pieces of gold.
They were ready for you to wear on the day that you were born.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 당신이 태어난 날 착용할 준비가 되어 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: You lived in God's beautiful garden, Eden.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님의 아름다운 동산 에덴에 살았습니다.
